text: In the 1045 attack (Battle of Dvin), Byzantine forces were under Constantine IX Monomachos. The Byzantines assembled a large force under the command of Michael Iasites and Constantine the Alan and allied with Armenians under the command of Vahram Pahlawuni and Liparit Orbelean. ==References== * * Category:Battles Category:Byzantine Empire Category:History of Armenia
title: Battle of Dvin
